languages.text: "О да, меня куда лучше иметь в соратниках, чем во врагах! Никто не устоит пред гневом хранительницы великой святыни".

traits.locale_text: "О да, меня куда лучше иметь в соратниках, чем во врагах! Никто не устоит пред гневом хранительницы великой святыни".

languages.text: "Oh yes, better to have me as an ally than an opponent! For no foe of mine can survive the wrath of the keeper of the great relic."
languages.original_text: "О да, меня куда лучше иметь в соратниках, чем во врагах! Никто не устоит пред гневом хранительницы великой святыни".

traits.locale_text: "Oh yes, anyone is better off with me as their ally! For no foe of mine can survive the wrath of the keeper of the great relic."
"Oh yes, anyone is better off with me as their ally! For no foe of mine can survive the wrath of the keeper of the great relic."
"Oh yes, better to have me as an ally than an opponent! For no foe of mine can survive the wrath of the keeper of the great relic."
"Oh yes, better to have me as an ally than an opponent! For no foe of mine can survive the wrath of the keeper of the great relic."
"Oh yes, better to have me as an ally than an opponent! For no foe of mine can survive the wrath of the keeper of the great relic."

languages.text: “噢，没错，把我当成盟友，总比把我当成敌人要好！因为没有任何敌人，能在这位圣物守护者的愤怒中存活下来。”
languages.original_text: "Oh yes, better to have me as an ally than an opponent! For no foe of mine can survive the wrath of the keeper of the great relic."

traits.locale_text: “噢，没错，把我当成盟友，总比把我当成敌人要好！因为没有任何敌人，能在这位圣物守护者的愤怒中存活下来。”

languages.text: «Ah, sí, ¡es mejor tenerme como aliada que como oponente! Ningún enemigo mío puede sobrevivir a la furia de la guardiana de la gran reliquia».
languages.original_text: "Oh yes, better to have me as an ally than an opponent! For no foe of mine can survive the wrath of the keeper of the great relic."

traits.locale_text: «Ah, sí, ¡es mejor tenerme como aliada que como oponente! Ningún enemigo mío puede sobrevivir a la furia de la guardiana de la gran reliquia».

languages.text: 「ああ、その通りだ。敵にするよりも味方にした方がいい！偉大な聖遺物の番人の怒りには勝てる敵など一人もいないのだ」
languages.original_text: "Oh yes, better to have me as an ally than an opponent! For no foe of mine can survive the wrath of the keeper of the great relic."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、その通りだ。敵にするよりも味方にした方がいい！偉大な聖遺物の番人の怒りには勝てる敵など一人もいないのだ」

languages.text: "Oh ja, es ist besser, mich zur Verbündeten zu haben denn zur Gegnerin! Denn keiner meiner Feinde kann den Zorn der Hüterin des großen Relikts überleben."
languages.original_text: "Oh yes, better to have me as an ally than an opponent! For no foe of mine can survive the wrath of the keeper of the great relic."

traits.locale_text: "Oh ja, es ist besser, mich zur Verbündeten zu haben denn zur Gegnerin! Denn keiner meiner Feinde kann den Zorn der Hüterin des großen Relikts überleben."

languages.text: « Je ne vous le fais pas dire, il vaut mieux m'avoir pour alliée que pour ennemie ! Car aucun adversaire ne peut survivre aux foudres de la gardienne de l'auguste relique. »
languages.original_text: "Oh yes, better to have me as an ally than an opponent! For no foe of mine can survive the wrath of the keeper of the great relic."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne vous le fais pas dire, il vaut mieux m'avoir pour alliée que pour ennemie ! Car aucun adversaire ne peut survivre aux foudres de la gardienne de l'auguste relique. »

languages.text: "Evet, düşmanın değil de dostun olmak işine gelir! Nihayetinde hiçbir düşmanım, ulu yadigârın muhafızının gazabının karşısında hayatta kalamaz."
languages.original_text: "Oh yes, better to have me as an ally than an opponent! For no foe of mine can survive the wrath of the keeper of the great relic."
